TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DynamicField extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField implements class System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldFormattingOptions, class System.Web.UI.IAttributeAccessor
Public Class DynamicField Inherits DataControlField Implements IAttributeAccessor, IFieldFormattingOptions
type DynamicField = class inherit DataControlField interface IAttributeAccessor interface IFieldFormattingOptions

summary.span: 表示一个数据字段，该字段显示在使用 ASP.NET 动态数据功能的数据绑定控件中。

span.span: Represents a data field that is displayed in a data-bound control that uses ASP.NET Dynamic Data features.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 数据绑定控件（如 和 控件）使用 类来显示在自定义页中使用 ASP.NET 动态数据功能的字段值。The class is used by data-bound controls, such as the and controls, to display a field value that uses ASP.NET Dynamic Data features in custom pages. 类提供类似于 类的功能。The class provides functionality that resembles that of the class. 但是，因为在动态数据应用程序中使用 对象，所以可以利用以下动态数据功能：However, because a object is used in Dynamic Data applications, you can take advantage of the following Dynamic Data features: - 根据数据类型，使用字段模板自动呈现字段的适当控件。Automatically rendering the proper control for a field by using field templates, based on the data type. 可针对整个应用程序全局修改字段模板。The field templates can be globally modified for the entire application. - 基于数据库架构提供内置数据验证。Providing built-in data validation based on the database schema. 您还可以通过自定义数据模型来添加验证类型。You can also add validation types by customizing the data model. - 通过使用数据模型中的属性或通过使用 属性，自定义单个字段的数据呈现。Customizing data rendering for individual fields by using attributes in the data model or by using the property. 对象通过使用 `DynamicControl` 控件呈现每个字段。The object renders each field by using a `DynamicControl` control. 若要指定要在 对象中显示的数据字段，请将 属性设置为字段名称。To specify the data field to display in a object, set the property to the field name. 可以通过设置 属性，将自定义格式设置字符串应用于字段值。You can apply a custom formatting string to the field value by setting the property. 默认情况下，仅当数据绑定控件处于只读模式时，才将格式设置字符串应用于字段值。By default the formatting string is applied to field values only when the data-bound control is in read-only mode. 若要将格式设置字符串应用于数据绑定控件处于编辑模式时显示的值，请将 属性设置为 `true`。To apply the formatting string to values displayed while the data-bound control is in edit mode, set the property to `true`. 如果字段值为 `null`，则可以通过设置 属性来显示自定义标题。If a field value is `null`, you can display a custom caption by setting the property. 对象还可以通过将 属性设置为 `true`，自动将空字符串（""）字段值转换为 null 值。The object can also automatically convert empty string ("") field values to null values by setting the property to `true`. ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 请参阅此功能的运行时代码示例：[运行](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=120736&sref=System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField)。See a run-time code example of this feature: [Run](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=120736&sref=System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField). 下面的示例演示如何使用 控件中的 对象显示和编辑数据库表中的值。The following example demonstrates how to use the object in a control to display and edit values from a database table. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField/VB/Default.aspx#1)]

span.span: ASP.NET Dynamic Data Overview

related.span: 模型绑定和 Web 窗体

span.span: Model Binding and Web Forms

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化 类的新实例。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 当向动态创建的数据绑定控件添加字段时，通常使用此构造函数。This constructor is commonly used when adding fields to a dynamically created data-bound control. 若要将 对象动态添加到数据绑定控件，请创建新的 对象，设置其属性，然后将其添加到数据绑定控件的字段集合。To dynamically add a object to a data-bound control, create a new object, set its properties, and then add it to the data-bound control's field collection. 例如，如果使用 控件，请将 对象添加到 集合。For example, if you are using the control, add the object to the collection. > [!NOTE] > 虽然可将字段动态添加到数据绑定控件，但强烈建议根据需要静态声明字段，然后将其显示或隐藏。Although you can dynamically add fields to a data-bound control, it is strongly recommended that fields be statically declared and then shown or hidden, as appropriate. 静态声明所有字段可减小父数据绑定控件的视图状态的大小。Statically declaring all of your fields reduces the size of the view state for the parent data-bound control.

Public Property ApplyFormatInEditMode As Boolean

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当数据字段处于编辑模式时，是否将 属性指定的带格式的字符串应用于字段值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the formatted string that is specified by the property is applied to field value when the data field is in edit mode.

value.span: 如果 在编辑模式下应用格式设置，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the applies formatting in edit mode; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据绑定控件（如 和 ）具有不同的显示模式，使用户能够读取、编辑或插入记录。Data-bound controls (such as , and ) have different display modes that allow the user to read, edit, or insert records. 默认情况下，仅当数据绑定控件处于只读模式时， 属性指定的格式设置字符串才应用于字段值。By default, the formatting string specified by the property is applied to field values only when the data-bound control is in read-only mode. 若要将格式设置字符串应用于数据绑定控件处于编辑模式时显示的值，请将 属性设置为 `true`。To apply the formatting string to values displayed while the data-bound control is in edit mode, set the property to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 当数据源中的字段被更新时， 对象不会自动删除该格式。A object does not automatically remove the formatting when the field is updated in the data source. 如果不希望格式设置为存储的值的一部分，则需要以编程方式删除格式设置。If you do not want the formatting as part of the value stored, you will need to remove the formatting programmatically.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在数据源中更新数据字段时是否将空字符串值 ("") 自动转换为 null 值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether empty string values ("") are automatically converted to null values when the data field is updated in the data source.

value.span: 如果为 ，则将空字符串值自动转换为 null 值；否则为 。

span.span: to automatically convert empty string values to null values; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有时，用户在更新或插入记录时可能会输入空字符串作为字段值。Sometimes the user might enter an empty string for a field value when updating or inserting records. 使用 属性可以指定在数据源中更新数据字段时是否将空字符串值自动转换为 null。Use the property to specify whether an empty string value is automatically converted to null when the data field is updated in the data source. 默认情况下， 对象将空值显示为空字符串。By default, a object displays null values as empty strings. 若要显示不同的值，请设置 属性。To display a different value, set the property. > [!NOTE] > 对象的父控件绑定到的数据源控件 对象还具有一个名为 的属性。The object of the data source control that the parent control of object is bound to also has a property named . 此属性执行相同的功能。This property performs the same function. 请确保这两个属性都已正确设置。Make sure that both properties are set appropriately.

summary.span: 获取或设置要将 对象绑定到的数据字段的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the data field to bind the object to.

value.span: 对象绑定到的数据字段的名称。

span.span: The name of the data field that the object is bound to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定要绑定到 对象的数据字段。Use the property to specify the data field to bind to the object. 数据字段可以是列名称，也可以是用于外键列的关系名称。The data field can be the column name or, for foreign key columns, the relationship name. 默认情况下，使用与字段数据类型关联的字段模板 对象显示指定数据字段。By default, the specified data field is displayed by the object using the field template that is associated with the field data type. 通过设置 "" 属性，可以更改为数据字段呈现的字段模板。You can change the field template that is rendered for the data field by setting the property. 还可以通过设置 "" 属性来设置显示的文本的格式。You can also format the displayed text by setting the property. 如果字段值为 `null`，则默认情况下将为该值显示空字符串（""）。If a field value is `null`, an empty string ("") is displayed for the value by default. 若要指定备用标题，请设置 属性。To specify an alternate caption, set the property. **注意**如果要全局更改数据字段的显示和行为，则必须将属性应用于数据模型，而不是在 对象的特定实例中设置此属性。**Note** If you want to change the display and behavior of a data field globally, you must apply attributes to your data model instead of setting this in a particular instance of the object. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 动态数据](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/78c7fcd7-5f38-46a0-a4bc-48eff3c8a512)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Dynamic Data](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/78c7fcd7-5f38-46a0-a4bc-48eff3c8a512). 当设置 属性时，将调用 方法来引发状态更改事件。The method is called to raise a state change event when the property is set. 属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of the property is stored in view state.

MemberSignature.Value: public string DataFormatString { get; set; }
.property instance string DataFormatString
Public Property DataFormatString As String
public: property System::String ^ DataFormatString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DataFormatString : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置为数据字段的值指定显示格式的字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the string that specifies the display format for the value of the data field.

value.span: 为数据字段的值指定显示格式的格式设置字符串。

span.span: A formatting string that specifies the display format for the value of the data field.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表明没有对值应用特殊格式设置。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that no special formatting is applied to the value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性为 对象中显示的值指定自定义的显示格式。Use the property to specify a custom display format for the values displayed in the object. 如果未设置 属性，则显示字段值而不进行任何特殊格式设置。If the property is not set, the field value is displayed without any special formatting. 默认情况下，仅当包含 对象的数据绑定控件处于只读模式时，才会将格式设置字符串应用于字段值。By default, the formatting string is applied to the field value only when the data-bound control that contains the object is in read-only mode. 若要在编辑模式下将格式设置字符串应用于字段值，请将 属性设置为 `true`。To apply the formatting string to the field value while in edit mode, set the property to `true`. 使用 属性指定的显示格式特定于 类的此实例。The display format that you specify using the property is specific to this instance of the class. 还可以通过向数据模型应用 并在构造函数中设置 命名参数，来更改整个应用程序中的数据字段的显示格式。You can also change the display format for a data field across the entire application by applying the to your data model and setting the named parameter in the constructor. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 动态数据](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/78c7fcd7-5f38-46a0-a4bc-48eff3c8a512)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Dynamic Data](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/78c7fcd7-5f38-46a0-a4bc-48eff3c8a512).

related.span: 设置 .NET 中类型的格式

span.span: Formatting Types in .NET

summary.span: 获取或设置在包含 对象的数据绑定控件的标题中显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that is displayed in the header of the data-bound control that contains the object.

value.span: 在包含 对象的数据绑定控件的标题中显示的文本。

span.span: The text that is displayed in the header of the data-bound control that contains the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可在数据绑定控件中使用友好名称标识字段。Use the property to identify a field in a data-bound control with a friendly name. 属性最常见的应用是为 或 控件中的数据字段提供有意义的列名称。The most common application of the property is to provide meaningful column names to data fields in a or control. 默认情况下， 属性使用 属性为数据字段设置的显示名称。By default, the property uses the display name set for the data field by using the attribute. 如果未设置显示名称，则 属性将使用 属性的值。If the display name is not set, the property uses the value of the property.

exception.span: 对象位于一个数据绑定控件内，该控件未绑定到实现 接口的数据源控件。

span.span: The object is inside a data-bound control that is not bound to a data source control that implements the interface.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在 对象中显示数据字段值之前，这些数据字段值是否经过 HTML 编码。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether data field values are HTML-encoded before they are displayed in a object.

value.span: 如果字段值在显示前已经过了 HTML 编码，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if field values are HTML-encoded before they are displayed; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定在显示字段值之前，这些字段值是否为其各自的字符串表示形式。Use the property to specify whether field values are HTML-encoded to their respective string representations before they are displayed. > [!NOTE] > HTML 编码字段值有助于防止显示跨站点脚本攻击和恶意内容。HTML-encoding field values helps to prevent cross-site scripting attacks and malicious content from being displayed. 应尽可能启用此属性。This property should be enabled whenever possible. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)).

span.span: Script Exploits Overview

summary.span: 获取或设置当字段值为 时，为数据字段显示的标题。

span.span: Gets or sets the caption that is displayed for a data field when the field value is .

value.span: 当字段值为 时，为数据字段显示的标题。

span.span: The caption that is displayed for a data field when the field value is .

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有时，字段值在数据源中存储为 null。Sometimes a field value is stored as null in the data source. 通过设置 "" 属性，可以为具有 null 值的数据字段指定要显示的自定义标题。You can specify a custom caption to display for data fields that have a null value by setting the property. 如果未设置此属性，则 null 字段值显示为空字符串（""）。If this property is not set, null field values are displayed as empty strings ("").

summary.span: 获取动态字段的只读状态。

span.span: Gets the read-only state of the dynamic field.
The read-only state of the dynamic field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `true` 属性， 控件将加载只读模板。If the property is `true`, the control loads a read-only template. 此属性要求启用视图状态。This property requires that view state be enabled.

summary.span: 获取或设置当数据字段用于排序数据源时所使用的排序表达式。

span.span: Gets or sets the sort expression that is used when the data field is used to sort the data source by.

value.span: 当数据字段用于排序数据源时所使用的排序表达式。

span.span: The sort expression that is used when the data field is used to sort the data source by.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性通过设置 属性，尝试使用与 对象关联的 column 对象的 属性的值。The property tries to use the value of the property of the column object that is associated with the object by setting the property. 当设置 属性时，将调用 方法来引发状态更改事件。The method is called to raise a state change event when the property is set. 属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of the property is stored in view state.

exception.span: 对象位于一个数据绑定控件内，该控件未绑定到实现 接口的数据源控件。

span.span: The object is inside a data-bound control that is not bound to a data source control that implements the interface.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于显示数据字段的字段模板。

span.span: Gets or sets the field template to use for displaying the data field.

value.span: 用于显示数据字段的字段模板的名称。

span.span: The name of the field template to use for displaying the data field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定用于显示数据字段的 UI 的字段模板。Use the property to specify the field template to use to display the UI for a data field. 默认情况下，字段模板是用户控件，它们的名称包含一个后缀，用于标识用于编辑操作和插入操作的字段模板。Field templates by default are user controls and their names contain a suffix to identify field templates that are used for edit operations and insert operations. 后缀分别 _edit 和 _insert。The suffixes are _edit and _insert, respectively. 将值设置为 属性时，请设置不带后缀的名称。When you set a value to the property, you set the name without the suffixes. 动态数据将标识数据字段的当前模式，并且将呈现正确的字段模板。Dynamic Data will identify the current mode of the data field and will render the correct field template. 如果未设置 属性，则默认情况下动态数据将基于字段类型呈现字段模板。If the property is not set, Dynamic Data by default will render the field template based on the field type. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 动态数据基架](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e0166a58-9178-4660-81a6-175994b11b12)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Dynamic Data Scaffolding](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e0166a58-9178-4660-81a6-175994b11b12). 使用 属性指定的字段模板特定于 类的此实例。The field template that you specify using the property is specific to this instance of the class. 您还可以通过将 应用到您的数据模型，来更改数据字段在整个应用程序中使用的字段模板。You can also change the field template used by a data field across the entire application by applying the to your data model. 设置 属性将替代应用于数据模型的元数据。Setting the property overrides the metadata applied to the data model. 有关元数据属性的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 动态数据](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/78c7fcd7-5f38-46a0-a4bc-48eff3c8a512)。For more information about metadata attributes, see [ASP.NET Dynamic Data](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/78c7fcd7-5f38-46a0-a4bc-48eff3c8a512). 当设置 属性时，将调用 方法来引发状态更改事件。The method is called to raise a state change event when the property is set. 属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of the property is stored in view state.

span.span: ASP.NET Dynamic Data Overview
